io.github.teamfractal.util

Class TileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.util.TileConverter

  • public class TileConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Perfroms various operations relating to the map tiles (and player and roboticon overlays) that are displayed on screen
